about.title: About Me
about.quote: I don't just write code. I solve business problems.
about.p1: I'm Isaac Martinez, a Software Architect based in Santiago, Dominican Republic. I specialize in building scalable backend systems, cloud infrastructure, and AI-powered features that drive real business value.
about.p2: With 9+ years of experience in Node.js, TypeScript, and AWS, I've helped startups and established companies ship products faster, reduce technical debt, and scale their systems reliably. I take pride in writing clean, maintainable code and communicating effectively with teams.
about.p3: I'm currently available for full-time roles or contract work. If you're looking for someone who can hit the ground running and deliver results, let's talk.
